channel.title: Pk Reality Reborn
channel.description:
[CENTER]Our Forum Link~ [url=http://www.pkreality.tk]www.pkreality.tk[/url] Download link: [url=http://s4.zetaboards.com/Pk_Reality/forum/3670834/]http://s4.zetaboards.com/Pk_Reality/forum/3670834/ [/url] Webclient Link: [url=http://s4.zetaboards.com/Pk_Reality/forum/3819150/]http://s4.zetaboards.com/Pk_Reality/forum/3819150/[/url]
Pk-Reality is a server that is back and better than ever! All features of the server have been re-vamped and are coded to perfection!
Main attractions/ Server Features! - Click 2 Edit Stats (combat) - - Perfect Switching - - Never Before Seen Clue Scroll System - - Achievement System that interest players in all aspects of the server - - Killstreaks which give rewards and increased pk points - - Pvp drops (statuettes) that can give up to 250 pk points! - - Perfect Duel Arena with 0 dupes! - - Custom Assault minigame where you get defenders and void - - new firecape and completionist cape - - Rapidly growing community compete against great bridders and pkers - - Daily Server events hosted by staff and owner - - Highscores to compete for the number 1 spot - - Player owned shops - - Auto-Donations that give donators their benefits and items automatically - - Non-Cheatable Voting system with amazing rewards - - Great bossing with over 15 main bosses giving amazing rewards - - Perfect slayer system having players search all over the map to kill monsters - - Fully coded nex with amazing rewards - - Over 150 Players registered on forums - - Perfectly coded specials for all items - - Awesome pk, slayer, donator, and vote shops with awesome items! - - Great economy MONEY IS ACTUALLY WORTH SOMETHING! - - SERVER IS 100% ONLINE ONLY DOWN FOR UPDATES - - ALL SKILLS WORKING - - REGULAR CONTENT UPDATES-
What are you waiting for? Start your adventure at Pk-Reality today!
[img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/9734/assaultshopo.png[/img] [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/379/donatorisland.png[/img] [img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/2433/eliteclue.png[/img] [img]http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/4329/korasispec.png[/img] [img]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/6894/mithrilseeds.png[/img] [img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/5403/nexl.png[/img] [img]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/9311/pkpshopf.png[/img] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8797/voteshop.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Pk Reality Reborn

yes the elite clue scrolls work and are 100%. There are 4 different stages of clue scrolls that range from easy, medium, hard and elite. Come check it out! player-count is growing quickly! =p

item.title: Pk Reality Reborn
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

[CENTER]Our Forum Link~ www.pkreality.tk
Download link:
http://s4.zetaboards.com/Pk_Reality/forum/3670834/

Webclient Link:
http://s4.zetaboards.com/Pk_Reality/forum/3819150/

Pk-Reality is a server that is back and better than ever! All features of the server have been re-vamped and are coded to perfection!

Main attractions/ Server Features!

  • Click 2 Edit Stats (combat) -
  • Perfect Switching -
  • Never Before Seen Clue Scroll System -
  • Achievement System that interest players in all aspects of the server -
  • Killstreaks which give rewards and increased pk points -
  • Pvp drops (statuettes) that can give up to 250 pk points! -
  • Perfect Duel Arena with 0 dupes! -
  • Custom Assault minigame where you get defenders and void -
  • new firecape and completionist cape -
  • Rapidly growing community compete against great bridders and pkers -
  • Daily Server events hosted by staff and owner -
  • Highscores to compete for the number 1 spot -
  • Player owned shops -
  • Auto-Donations that give donators their benefits and items automatically -
  • Non-Cheatable Voting system with amazing rewards -
  • Great bossing with over 15 main bosses giving amazing rewards -
  • Perfect slayer system having players search all over the map to kill monsters -
  • Fully coded nex with amazing rewards -
  • Over 150 Players registered on forums -
  • Perfectly coded specials for all items -
  • Awesome pk, slayer, donator, and vote shops with awesome items! -
  • Great economy MONEY IS ACTUALLY WORTH SOMETHING! -
  • SERVER IS 100% ONLINE ONLY DOWN FOR UPDATES -
  • ALL SKILLS WORKING -
  • REGULAR CONTENT UPDATES-

What are you waiting for? Start your adventure at Pk-Reality today!








[/CENTER]
